item.title: A bug in the command wrapper of r-core-base 3.5.1-1+b2
item.description: Today, as I working on a post, I got this issue when using the R command wrapper: 1 2 3 $ Rscript --no-site-file -e 'blogdown::serve_site()' /usr/lib/R/bin/R: line 193: /usr/bin/sed: No such file or directory ERROR: option '-e' requires a non-empty argument I did not understand what happened so I decided to google it! The bug was already identified and reported ðŸ˜„. A side note to mention that several packages now imports callr (for instance pkgdown) and as it uses the R command wrapper (if I understand correctly) the current bug actually affects several different packages.
